live_updates: Tech crews are on site working towards a resolution. Thank you for your patience.
45056.summary: Some customers in the Edgemont area of Calgary are experiencing an interruption to their Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
45056.title: Dec 14 – Calgary (Edgemont) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
